title: unknown dirextx error
body: i keep getting an unknown directx error when trying to start, i updated my drivers about 3 days ago, then today after i get out of a game i cant start anymore cause of this bug

replies.body:
When you updated your drivers, did you perform a clean update or did you update over your old drivers directly? I recommend running all available windows updates and running the [**DirectX Web Installer**](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=35) to ensure there aren't any missing packages of DirectX that the client may need.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
and i used an utomatic installer so im not sure if it did it automatically
it says that i already have the most up to date version
